languages.text: Вольные Торговцы обладают огромной властью, и многие сильные мира сего желают союза с ними. Заключив договор с таким влиятельным лицом и обеспечив ему поставки ресурсов или богатств, Лорд-капитан заявит о себе как о предприимчивом торговце.

Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.
languages.original_text: Вольные Торговцы обладают огромной властью, и многие сильные мира сего желают союза с ними. Заключив договор с таким влиятельным лицом и обеспечив ему поставки ресурсов или богатств, Лорд-капитан заявит о себе как о предприимчивом торговце.

traits.locale_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

languages.text: 行商浪人拥有无人能及的权力，许多世界中有影响力的人们都希望能与行商浪人结盟。对领主舰长而言，如果能与强大的合作伙伴开展贸易，向这些伙伴提供资源与财富的话，便无疑能证明行商浪人是位精明的统治者。
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人拥有无人能及的权力，许多世界中有影响力的人们都希望能与行商浪人结盟。对领主舰长而言，如果能与强大的合作伙伴开展贸易，向这些伙伴提供资源与财富的话，便无疑能证明行商浪人是位精明的统治者。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は強大な力を持っている。惑星の有力者の多くが同盟を望んでいる。ロード・キャプテンにとって、そうした強力なパートナーと取引し、資源や富を供給することができれば、{mf|彼自身|彼女自身}が抜け目のない貿易商人であると証明することになる。
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は強大な力を持っている。惑星の有力者の多くが同盟を望んでいる。ロード・キャプテンにとって、そうした強力なパートナーと取引し、資源や富を供給することができれば、{mf|彼自身|彼女自身}が抜け目のない貿易商人であると証明することになる。

languages.text: Los Comerciantes Independientes cuentan con un poder inmenso, y muchas de las figuras más influyentes de cada mundo anhelan aliarse con ellos. Para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, llegar a un acuerdo con socios poderosos y proporcionarles recursos o riquezas es demostrar un buen sentido de los negocios.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: Los Comerciantes Independientes cuentan con un poder inmenso, y muchas de las figuras más influyentes de cada mundo anhelan aliarse con ellos. Para {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán, llegar a un acuerdo con socios poderosos y proporcionarles recursos o riquezas es demostrar un buen sentido de los negocios.

languages.text: Da Freihändler über eine enorme Macht verfügen, streben viele einflussreiche Persönlichkeiten der Welt ein Bündnis mit ihnen an. Durch ein Abkommen mit einem derart mächtigen Partner und dessen Versorgung mit Ressourcen und Reichtümern stünde {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} im Ruf, {mf|ein geschickter Spekulant|eine geschickte Spekulantin} zu sein.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: Da Freihändler über eine enorme Macht verfügen, streben viele einflussreiche Persönlichkeiten der Welt ein Bündnis mit ihnen an. Durch ein Abkommen mit einem derart mächtigen Partner und dessen Versorgung mit Ressourcen und Reichtümern stünde {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} im Ruf, {mf|ein geschickter Spekulant|eine geschickte Spekulantin} zu sein.

languages.text: Les libres-marchands possèdent un immense pouvoir et nombreux sont les puissants de ce monde à vouloir nouer une alliance avec eux. Pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, collaborer avec un partenaire aussi puissant et lui fournir des richesses ou des ressources permettrait de se bâtir une réputation d'{mf|entrepreneur|entrepreneuse} de talent.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: Les libres-marchands possèdent un immense pouvoir et nombreux sont les puissants de ce monde à vouloir nouer une alliance avec eux. Pour {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}, collaborer avec un partenaire aussi puissant et lui fournir des richesses ou des ressources permettrait de se bâtir une réputation d'{mf|entrepreneur|entrepreneuse} de talent.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, elinde muazzam bir güç barındırır. Dünyanın en nüfuz sahipleri de onunla müttefik olmayı ister. Lord Kaptan'ın böyle güçlü bir ortakla anlaşması ve onu kaynaklarla veya varlıklarla desteklemesi, girişimcilik konusundaki becerisinin göstergesi olacaktır.
languages.original_text: Rogue Traders possess immense power, and many of the world's influential figures wish for an alliance with them. For the Lord Captain, to make a deal with such a powerful partner and supply them with resources or riches would be to assert {mf|himself|herself} as a shrewd venturer.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir elinde muazzam bir güç barındırır ve dünyanın en nüfuz sahibi şahısları onunla ittifak hâlinde olmayı ister. Lord Kaptan'ın böyle güçlü bir partnerle anlaşma imzalaması ve onu kaynaklarla veya varlıklarla desteklemesi, girişimcilik konusundaki becerisinin bir göstergesi olacaktır.
